pythonPosts.title: How to execute SQL queries (Select, Update, Insert, Delete) effectively using Python?
pythonPosts.excerpt: The database is an integral part of most software applications. We always try to find out what is the best way to connect to the database. Often use readily available frameworks. The one thing I have experienced often frameworks or libraries provide a lot of abstractions to make it easy for end developers to use the framework or library.
